caption.p: Taylor diagram for mean surface temperature between CRU and CMIP5 individual model during the period 1901–2005 ( a), IMD and CMIP5 individual model for the years 1969–2005 ( b) over India. Solid lines correspond to standard deviation; dotted lines for correlations (Figure was created using the Interactive Data Language (IDL) version 8.2 software http://www.harrisgeospatial.com/docs/whats_new_in_82.html).
